short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates events and flows by clicking on elements on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your product analytics to the next level with EasyClick.ai, the essential tool for product managers, growth teams, and data-driven professionals. Seamlessly integrate event and flow tracking directly into your website, making smarter decisions faster.

To access the full features of this extension, please register at EasyClick.ai first.
